definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to sell/to make or carry out (a plan or intrigue etc)

sentences.english: That's more than you'll get from even a 30-year Treasury at the moment.
sentences.chinese: 比那個財政部現在標售的30年期的國債收益都要高。

sentences.english: Residual or obsolete goods sold at tenders by all levels of government.
sentences.chinese: 各級政府機關標售賸剩或廢棄之物資。

sentences.english: The Environmental Protection Agency began holding annual auctions to sell the pollution permits.
sentences.chinese: 美國環保署每年開辦標售會，出售污染許可。

definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
remittance/funds paid to a bank account
debt security/collateralized debt obligation (CDO), type of bond
